title: How to Fix Outlook Error 0x800ccc0b While Sending of Email

steps.title: Click on the “Account Settings” under the “Tools” menu.
steps.content: Click on the “Account Settings” under the “Tools” menu.

steps.title: In the new account setting window, click on the “Email” and make a double click on the email address by which you are not able to send emails.
steps.content: In the new account setting window, click on the “Email” and make a double click on the email address by which you are not able to send emails.

steps.title: Through double click other pop-up window will appear, now click on “More Settings” buttons.
steps.content: Through double click other pop-up window will appear, now click on “More Settings” buttons.

steps.title: Go to the Outgoing Server tab and select the “My outgoing server (SMTP) requires authentication” checkbox.
steps.content: Go to the Outgoing Server tab and select the “My outgoing server (SMTP) requires authentication” checkbox.
